Class NAR_PIDSubsystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.SubsystemBase

    edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.Sendable, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Subsystem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElevatorTemplate, PivotTemplate, ShooterTemplate
    public abstract class NAR_PIDSubsystem
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.SubsystemBase

        public void setUpdateTime​(double timeSeconds)
        Sets the amount of time between measurement logging to account for noisy measurements.
        Parameters:
        timeSeconds - The time in seconds between each update.

      • setSafetyThresh

        public void setSafetyThresh​(double timeSeconds)
        Sets the safetyThreshold to disable PID if setpoint is not reached
        Parameters:
        timeSeconds - The time in seconds for the safety threshold

        public void setTolerance​(double positionTolerance)
        Sets the error which is considered tolerable for use with atSetpoint().
        Parameters:
        positionTolerance - Position error which is tolerable.

        public void setConstraints​(double min,
                           double max)
        Sets constraints for the setpoint of the PID subsystem.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum setpoint for the subsystem
        max - The maximum setpoint for the subsystem

      • startPID

        public void startPID​(double setpoint)
        Sets the setpoint for the subsystem.
        Parameters:
        setpoint - the setpoint for the subsystem

      • enableContinuousInput

        public void enableContinuousInput​(double minimumInput,
                                  double maximumInput)
        Enables continuous input.

        Rather then using the max and min input range as constraints, it considers them to be the same point and automatically calculates the shortest route to the setpoint.

        Parameters:
        minimumInput - The minimum value expected from the input.
        maximumInput - The maximum value expected from the input.

      • getSetpoint

        public double getSetpoint()
        Returns the current setpoint of the subsystem.
        Returns:
        The current setpoint

      • atSetpoint

        public boolean atSetpoint()
        Returns true if subsystem is at setpoint, false if not
        Returns:
        If subsystem is at setpoint

      • useOutput

        protected abstract void useOutput​(double output,
                                  double setpoint)
        Uses the output from the PIDController.
        Parameters:
        output - The output of the PIDController
        setpoint - The setpoint of the controller.

      • getMeasurement

        protected abstract double getMeasurement()
        Returns the measurement of the process variable used by the PIDController.
        Returns:
        the measurement of the process variable

      • enable

        public void enable()
        Enables the PID control. Resets the controller.

      • disable

        public void disable()
        Disables the PID control. Sets output to zero.

      • isDebug

        public boolean isDebug()
        Return whether the subsystem is in debug mode.
        Returns:
        Boolean, true being in debug, false being not in debug.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns whether the controller is enabled.
        Returns:
        Whether the controller is enabled.
